channel.title: Hosting a 24/7 Server
channel.description:
Sense I have a dedicated server (i useually host Counter-Strike:Source Servers on it)I decided i was gonna run a 24/7 server RS server sense i no longer play counter-strike. I am currently looking for a a good server source, I have been playing around with whitescape,Nixscape and Silabscape. I got a few problems with it them tho, when i do ::npc 1 to spawn like a man to kill it, my client crashs. I read that if you change the health in the npc.cfg it will fix it, but it dident, So if somone can post a server source with this fix and allows a admin to spawn npcs, I will give them a admin slot.Also i tryed the autospawn.cfg but it connects to the server then loses connection.
When I get a working Server Source im going to buy a domain and make a website and when everthing is working correctly, im going to be looking for 5-10 Admins and about 10-20 Mods.
Contact me: Reply to the thread ^_^ Aim:LiLdEmOnDoG Msn:LiLdEmOnDoG@Gmail.com

item.title: Hosting a 24/7 Server
item.dc:creator: @LiLdEmOnDoG LiLdEmOnDoG
item.description:
@LiLdEmOnDoG wrote:

diablo1123:

well 2 add attackin npcs u need them in ur autosapwn.cfg

yeah i copyed a line from the autospawn.cfg and pasted it under the line that i copyed it from and changed the ID and it lags out when i try to connect ^_^, so yeah im looking for a server source that wont crash when u attack npcs from ::npc and or autospawn.cfg.

edit:I tryed testing to spawn a kalphite queen but yeah it just says connecting then i lose connection

Read full topic
